description: The Navado men’s hybrid jacket presents a dynamic look and design and features all the qualities expected of a quilted and softshell training jacket.<br><br>Enjoy optimal mobility and comfort during your outdoor training or winter sports outing with its stretchy panels on the back, softshell protection at the waist and bounded mesh inserts on the back and sides. This jacket's front insulation is water-repellent and covers your chest for better cold protection.<br><br>The Navado hybrid jacket is designed to offer insulation and warmth where required while providing optimal fit and minimal weight. It features reflective details to ensure you are visible in low light. Perfect jacket for the active world.<br><br>Two higher up zipped pockets in front and one centre zipped pocket in the back for your convenience.
name: Navado Hybrid Jacket - Mens
